actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.
Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia with amendment, H. Rept. 93-258.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #204 (330-12).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the District of Columbia, S. Rept. 93-371.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Election Act regarding the times for filing certain petitions, regulating the primary election for Delegate from the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets qualifications for voters, under the District of Columbia Election Act. Regulates the times for filing specific petitions. Makes provisions for the primary election for Delegate from the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Election Act regarding the times for filing certain petitions, regulating the primary election for Delegate from the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
